title: Deep Learning-Based Prediction of Colorectal Cancer Molecular Subtypes: Introduction to Digital Pathology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic biology and digital image analysis concepts
context.additional_context: A modular 15-minute learning design for mobile-based social education programs targeting working professionals.

learning_goals: Explain deep learning-based classification methods for colorectal cancer molecular subtypes using H&E tissue slide images
Interpret digital pathology analysis results in conjunction with actual clinical data
Assess clinical applicability of image-based predictive models for tumor heterogeneity analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
